summary: This bill, the "Destroying Unnecessary, Misaligned, and Prohibitive Red Tape Act of 2025" (DUMP Red Tape Act), directs the Chief Counsel for Advocacy of the Small Business Administration to establish a Red Tape Hotline. This hotline will receive notifications from small businesses about burdensome agency rules. The Chief Counsel will also create a website with the hotline information and will submit annual reports to Congress and the Administrator of the Small Business Administration, summarizing the notifications received, affected industries, recommendations for agencies, and actions taken.
